001package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.extensions;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.connector.BaseDbConnectorService;
004import org.junit.jupiter.api.Order;
005import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.AfterAllCallback;
006import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext;
007import org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext;
008import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;
009import org.springframework.test.context.junit.jupiter.SpringExtension;
010
011/**
012 * JUnit 5 extension for managing database connections in tests.
013 *
014 * <p>This extension ensures that all database connections are properly closed
015 * after all tests have been executed. It integrates with Spring's application
016 * context to retrieve and manage database connections.
017 *
018 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
019 */
020@Order(Integer.MAX_VALUE)
021@Component
022public class DbTestExtension implements AfterAllCallback {
023
024   /**
025    * Closes all active database connections after all test executions.
026    *
027    * <p>This method retrieves the {@link BaseDbConnectorService} from the Spring
028    * application context and invokes its connection cleanup mechanism.
029    *
030    * @param context The JUnit extension context.
031    */
032   @Override
033   public void afterAll(ExtensionContext context) {
034      ApplicationContext appCtx = SpringExtension.getApplicationContext(context);
035      BaseDbConnectorService baseDbConnectorService = appCtx.getBean(BaseDbConnectorService.class);
036      baseDbConnectorService.closeConnections();
037   }
038}
